rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious and inviting entrance hall with floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light. The area is aligned according to Vastu principles, ensuring a welcoming energy.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Traditional Kerala-style living space with open layout and high ceilings. Floor-to-ceiling windows provide ample natural light, promoting a vibrant atmosphere.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room for an integrated dining and seating area. The design respects Vastu alignments by placing it in a southeast direction.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A compact, yet efficient kitchen utilizing local materials and traditional Kerala architecture. It includes storage and an open layout to maintain a connection with the dining area.

rooms.name: Guest Room
rooms.description: A guest room located on the ground floor, designed with Vastu principles for balanced energy. It includes a small private balcony to enjoy the outdoors.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A dedicated gym area on the ground floor, featuring multi-purpose flooring and open design with plenty of natural light through floor-to-ceiling windows.

rooms.name: Washroom
rooms.description: A functional washroom integrated into the house, designed to be accessible from both the living and guest areas. Floor-to-ceiling windows ensure proper ventilation.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Large, inviting entrance with floor-to-ceiling glass doors allowing natural light and maintaining connection with the outdoors.

openings.name: Balcony Opening
openings.description: Openings leading to private balconies ensuring cross ventilation in accordance with Vastu principles.

openings.name: Window Panels
openings.description: Multiple floor-to-ceiling window panels strategically placed to maximize natural lighting and ventilation while ensuring privacy when needed.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom designed for tranquility and privacy. The design includes a private balcony with floor-to-ceiling windows, aligning with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Secondary bedroom designed for family members. It features a blend of traditional Kerala style and modern amenities, ensuring ample natural light.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom with an adjoining storage space. The layout is optimized for privacy and relaxation in line with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: A modest bedroom ensuring balanced energy flow as per Vastu, ideal for guests or extended family members.

rooms.name: Washroom
rooms.description: Fully functional washroom with modern fixtures and natural light through floor-to-ceiling windows, designed in a compact layout to optimize space.

openings.name: Balcony Access
openings.description: Access points leading to private balconies ensuring proper ventilation and alignment with Vastu principles.

openings.name: Floor-to-Ceiling Windows
openings.description: Strategically placed window panels providing abundant natural light to all bedrooms and enhancing the overall aesthetic of the floor.

rooms.name: Mezzanine Study/Relaxation Area
rooms.description: A multi-functional mezzanine area that serves as a study or relaxation space. It features floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light, and is designed in keeping with Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Storage/Utility Room
rooms.description: A compact storage room designed to store household utilities and miscellaneous items. The design adheres to local building norms.

openings.name: Staircase
openings.description: Well-designed staircase connecting all levels, ensuring safe and comfortable movement while adhering to local building codes.

description: A traditional Kerala-style Nalukettu triplex 5BHK house designed with a focus on natural light, ventilation, and adherence to Vastu principles. The design includes multi-functional spaces on each level, integrating local building norms and cost-effective solutions.
